metadata.title: CVE-2020-35502 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.29. Memory leaks when aresponse is buffered and the buffer limit is reached or Privoxy is runningout of memory can lead to a system crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1ubuntu0.1').
